title: AJG Wellbeing Zone
description:
What’s your Wellness Score? Take a Wellbeing Assessment and see which aspects of your lifestyle need some focus. Your Wellbeing score is calculated using an algorithm that takes into account a range of health, fitness & lifestyle issues - including physical fitness, weight, stress, smoking, alcohol and sleep.
 
The AJG Wellbeing Zone app then gives you all the tools, support and information you need to make positive changes – helping you to enhance your wellbeing, lead a healthier lifestyle and improve your Wellbeing Score.
 
Main features include...
 
Wellbeing Dashboard – customise your Wellbeing Dashboard for an overview of your current wellbeing levels – see quickly and clearly which areas of your lifestyle need some focus. Set goals and track your progress towards a healthier life.

Wellbeing Assessment – complete the assessment wheel and find out your Wellbeing Score. Follow your programmes and come back for another checkup anytime to see how you’re getting on.

Goal Setting & Gamification– Set your Wellbeing Goals for a wide range of lifestyle issues and win badges and status updates as you achieve the milestones!

Logbook – Record your progress towards your goals…  Keep track of what you eat and how much you weigh, make a note of activity and calories burnt – and keep on top of other factors like caffeine intake and sleep patterns. 

Programmes – Pick up your recommended fitness, activity & stress management programmes - see video demos of each routine or exercise. You can even create your own custom version by searching our exercise and relaxation programmes library.

Community - You can optionally opt in to connect with friends from your organisation. Exchange messages and status updates to keep each other motivated to achieve those wellbeing goals!

Resources for you – Watch the latest Wellbeing videos, read articles, pick up tips and advice – enjoy rich multi-media content filtered and displayed according to your goals and interests.

title: One You Active 10 Walk Tracker
description:
Active 10 tracks your walking and shows you when to increase your pace to benefit your health. The app is designed to quickly and simply help you do more brisk walking in bursts of ten minutes, known as Active 10s. It tracks all your walking and rewards your progress.

Key features:
•	Breaks your target down into manageable chunks of ten minutes of brisk walking
•	Shows you when you’ve walked at the right speed
•	Gives you goals to work towards
•	Rewards your progress 
•	Shows where you can convert normal walking into Active 10s 
•	Provides hints and tips 

BRISK WALKING BENEFITS YOUR HEALTH

We all know how important it is to be active. The good news is that you don’t have to go to the gym or start expensive fitness programmes, walking counts too!

Just ten minutes of brisk walking every day can get your heart pumping  and can make you feel more energetic, as well as lowering your risk of serious illnesses like heart disease and type 2 diabetes. Going for a brisk walk is a great way to clear your head.

Active 10s are simple to fit into your day, from taking the dog out to going for a lunchtime walk. 

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can impact battery life.

This app relies on your phone’s inbuilt sensors to measure activity so you may experience varying levels of accuracy especially in older devices/operating systems. To improve accuracy, keep your phone in a pocket close to your body rather than in a loose coat pocket or bag.

This is an early version of the app. If you have any feedback for how we can improve the app please send it to oneyou@phe.gov.uk. 

Frequently asked questions: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/active10/faqs#xQYHQxaKMtCArDuc.97

Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Pantagea (Pan-ta-jee-uh) is generated from Pangea or Pangaea "The hypothetical landmass that existed when all continents were joined, from about 300 to 200 million years ago" and Panthalassa "The ocean that surrounded the supercontinent Pangea." 

This is why we chose our application name as Pantagea and motto as "a World in Unity."

Amplify the power of your heart's intention with our app for engaging the collective love vibration.

Pantagea is all about sending and receiving good vibrations that can affect your life in a fun and very positive way. The app allows you to participate in anonymity, if needed, and it is a safe for all ages.

The app helps you increase and extend loving intentional vibrations surrounding a personal, community or global event. In just a few clicks you can form groups, invite participants, and share your request for a joining of their heart’s energy to achieve the highest good for all concerned. 

Too often we want to 'do something' about a situation, but feel too busy, too remote, too alone, or too inconsequential. Now, through Pantagea, it takes only seconds to connect your heart with events on the app. There you can offer love and support to others through your form of prayer. There is no need for a shared language, culture, or religion — just the joining of hearts' intentions. 

The app allows you to see your energy in action and the deep appreciation of those receiving your prayers. Watch as shared vibrations increase. 

The app contains the following features:
• Vibes - You may choose your vibration, create your group, set your intentions and schedule it
• Reminders - allows you to form your group in advance and post it when the time is right
• Manifestations -  a unique and easy way to focus on your vision and allow it into your life
• Journal Page - a way to share experiences and learn about this unique field of unity and love

Start sharing your time and energy and be part of raising the vibrations.

Blessings,
Pantagea Family

#Love #Energy #Vibrations #Prayer #Manifestation #Fun #Unity #Meditation #Emotions #Intention #Oneness #Mindfulness #Communication #HighestGood #Universe

title: SQRL
description:
SQRL provides a simple way for you to train your emotional, physical, and financial well-being everyday.

We believe you already have everything you need to live your best life, but we could do with a nudge at the right time. SQRL focuses on the 3 most important dimensions of your well-being: physical, emotional and financial. 

Emotional 

Start and complete each day by journaling your gratitude to make happiness your way of being.

Physical 

Track how much you naturally walk each day and work on building up a habit of walking 10,000 steps each day.

We’ll help you stay active by encouraging you to first match yesterday’s steps, then go 500 steps further each day till you’re averaging 10,000 steps a day!

(SQRL integrates with your Apple Health app to capture your activity - steps, active energy, workouts, and walking & running distance).

Financial 

Discover how much you could save while you are walking the dog, going for a jog or even while you're shopping at the mall. Every 1,000 steps you take is potentially a $1 saved.

SQRL is completely free to try for as long as you like and when you are ready to start saving, you can upgrade your account for a one-time fee of $4.99. The in-app purchase allows you can fund your savings from your checking account into a savings account of your choice. 

If you need a place to put your savings, we've got some great low cost, high interest savings accounts for you in our marketplace.

You can set a daily limit so the savings never get out of your control. We’ll move the funds from your checking account to your savings account at the end of each week based on your activity.

SQRL uses 256 bit encryption and bank grade technology to securely link your existing bank accounts and move funds through our partner APIs.

title: Speak Up - Katy ISD
description: Speak Up, an anonymous reporting system, empowers Katy ISD students, parents, and community members to anonymously submit safety and well-being tips to help prevent school related incidents that could cause harm to others. Tips may include bullying, weapons, suicide or self-harm, illicit drug use, inappropriate relationships, violence, and other concerns for safety and well-being. title: Guard1 Tracking Mobile App
description:
Guard1 Tracking is a zone-based tracking system. It uses wristbands and tags to track and report the location of people and objects within your facility.  Guard1 can be used at correctional facilities, hospital and medical facilities, long-term care facilities and nursing homes.
 
The Guard1 Tracking Mobile App is designed to be used in conjunction with Guard1 Tracking Server software to record well-being checks, inspections, and movement into, out of, and within your facility.
 
Alerts – Guard1 Tracking generates alerts for out-of-bounds or keep-separate violations. It tracks who acknowledged the alert for complete traceability. You can put tags on tools and utensils – kitchen implements, for example – and receive an alert if they are taken out of their allowed areas.
 
Whiteboard – Many facilities use some sort of a board in their housing units to keep track of bed assignments and in- and out-counts visually. They move the cards or write on the whiteboard to indicate that an individual is out of the housing unit, at an appointment, or recreation, or medical, or whatever. Guard1 Tracking uses a similar concept. The whiteboard view (shown above) is probably the one your staff will use the most in Guard1 Tracking, because it is similar to something you are probably doing now, and it presents a lot of information at once.
 
Maps – The map view is a convenient way to get a look at who is where in your facility. Click on a zone to see a list of all the tags in the zone, including staff members and objects. The map view also provides a graphical display of where any active alerts are in your facility.
 
Individual Detail – Select an individual and view details, ID number, current location, keep-separates.
 
People Search – Guard1 has advanced searching to quickly locate information about a specific individual. You can search by first or last name, ID number, gender, released/not released, and more.
 
Handouts - Record distribution of meals, medication, personal items – anything!
 
Out Zones - Document transfers outside your facility, for medical, court, work release, or other purposes.  Record the expected return time and get an alert if the individual has not returned when expected.
 
Activities - Document escorts, services like showers, visitation, classes – anything!
 
Monitors – See all activity for a group of people or a zone in real time.
 
Reports – Guard1 Tracking includes a powerful reporting engine. Easily set up reports to filter for a specific date and time period, specific individuals or zone, and so forth. Export your reports in a variety of formats including PDF, Word, or Excel.

title: Alternative Therapies in Health and Medicine
description:
Launched in 1995, Alternative Therapies in Health and Medicine has a mission to promote the art and science of integrative medicine and a responsibility to improve public health. We strive to maintain the highest standards of ethical medical journalism independent of special interests that is timely, accurate, and a pleasure to read. We publish original, peer-reviewed scientific articles that provide health care providers with continuing education to promote health, prevent illness, and treat disease. Alternative Therapies in Health and Medicine was the first journal in this field to be indexed in the National Library of Medicine. In 2006, 2007, and 2008, ATHM had the highest impact factor ranking of any independently published peer-reviewed CAM journal in the United States—meaning that its research articles were cited more frequently than any other journal’s in the field.

The magazine has a normal frequency of 6 issues per year however this year it will be 8 and hopefully will stay with 8 issue next year.

title: Unmind – help your mind thrive
description:
We all have mental health, all of the time. 
Mental health exists on a spectrum, from surviving to thriving. Our scientifically proven tools and techniques have been designed with everyone in mind, no matter where you find yourself on this scale. We recognise that mental health is multifaceted so we’ve developed a constellation of tools proven to improve everything from happiness and sleep to focus and performance at work. 

Our approach combines neuroscience, positive psychology, mindfulness and the latest in Cognitive Behavioural Therapy that anyone can use to bolster their mental health. We are passionate about maintaining a platform that is scientifically robust and do this by partnering up with expert clinicians.

Our tools, training and exercises have been clinically backed to help you unlock a healthier and happier life both in and outside of work. Be it through following one of our new yoga sequences, relaxing to the calming sounds of a tropical storm or listening to a guided practice to help settle your racing mind, Unmind exists to nurture your mental health and wellbeing.

Main features include:
* Educational Series – A galaxy of bite-sized programmes developed by industry experts.
* Powerful Tools – world-class exercises for stress, focus, sleep and more.
* Check-In – track your mood over time, spot patterns and get personalised recommendations.
* Assessment – An in-depth measure of full wellbeing with actionable insight. 
* Friendly Bot – a digital companion to answer common questions.
* Secure Support – private, ironclad assistance; anytime, anywhere, any device.

Happy Unminding

P.s – Unmind is 100% free for users but only available if your company, university or insurer has signed up. If you are unsure how to register for Unmind, please contact your organisation’s administration directly.

P.p.s – At Unmind, we take data privacy very, very (VERY) seriously and adhere to the most rigorous security standards. Your personal information is 100% confidential and safe with Unmind.
releaseNotes: We’ve been hard at work updating the platform, giving it a fresh sprinkling of stardust to help you get even more out of Unmind. We collated all the amazing feedback from our users and turned it into rocket fuel to power our new engine and propel you on an even greater Unmind journey.

title: Ozmo Smart Bottle & Water App
description:
Ozmo App is a smart system designed to help you achieve a greater level of wellness. With ability to measure and record both your water and coffee consumption, the app works best with its companion smart bottle to track your progress throughout the day to help you reach your hydration goals. So you’ll know whether that 4pm latte is a good idea, or how much you should drink after that 5-mile bike ride. With Ozmo you can go about your day feeling healthy and energized, wherever you go, whatever you do.

How does it work?
The Ozmo Smart Bottle connects with the Ozmo App to record both your water and coffee consumption and tracks your progress throughout the day to help you reach your hydration goals. It syncs with Fitbit, Apple Watch, and other fitness trackers to re-evaluate your hydration needs post-workout.

App Features:
Personalized Hydration: Ozmo App gives you customized goals on the basis of your body type, geographical location, and level of activity.

Insightful Reports: Look at your daily, weekly and monthly progress. The App uses predictive modeling to give you tips and alerts to enhance your performance.

Nutrition Tracking: 
Track your fluid intake with barcode scanner which helps you make healthier choices and calculates your calories (US drinks).

Fitness Tracker Integration:
Two-way integration between Fitbit, Garmin, Misfit, Apple Health and the Ozmo App supports synchronization among apps for a full data analysis for post workout analysis.

Manual Logging:
Don’t have the smart bottle yet? Manually input your water consumption or use the barcode scanner.

Fun and motivational Notifications: 
The App communicates with fun and insightful hydration and fitness facts.
releaseNotes:
1) fix Garmin API issues
2) reload historical data button update at report
3) General Bug fix

title: Wellist News & Product Reviews

++ HEALTH & WELLNESS ++
Good habits, healthy eating, sleep soundly. Our network of expert content creators can help you feel your best.

++ LIFESTYLE & CAREER ++
Action is the goal, inspiration is the fuel. Get the most out of work and home life with help from peers and professionals alike.

++ MIND & BODY ++
Meditate like a boss, get ripped or find your zen. Trust teachers that are living the dream of a fulfilled life, everyday.

++ PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT ++
Find your motivation and build self confidence. Content, courses and stories to help you get through the daily grind.

++ SELF HELP & HAPPINESS ++
Get help from specialists in addiction to weight loss and replace those destructive habits with health ones. We're here to help you tackle the challenges that we all face.

++ SPIRITUALITY & MINDFULNESS ++
We're all on a journey and we're all spiritual beings. Learn from people that live to help and love to give.

WELLIST is the ultra simply way to add mindfulness, relaxation, life success and serenity to your daily grind.

WELLIST is free for life, just subscribe to our newsletter to unlock the app and weekly email

WELLIST is easy and you’ll want to check in every morning to see what wellness articles we’ve picked for you each day

Already got too many wellness, mindfulness and meditation apps? Are you getting happiness overload? Us too. We believe less is more. Download the Wellist app and simplify your life -- you'll get only 3-5 things per day. That's it.

++ WELLNESS ARTICLES ++ 
You get one amazing article from experts, gurus and professionals covering topics that will make an immediate impact on your life. From productivity to stress relief, inspiration and confidence, happiness and meditation, we’ve curated the best articles so you don’t have to search. If all you do is read these few each day, you’ll be set on a path to a better, happier and more fulfilled life.

 ++ HEALTHY RECIPES ++ 
You get one super yummy, super healthy recipe that you can make with stuff you probably already have in your fridge. Why download one of those recipe apps with 1 million recipes, who’s ever going to eat that much. All you need is one or two per day, as long as they are awesome and easy recipes, you’re set. That’s what we do. We hunt and find great recipes that are healthy, affordable, and easy to make and bring those to you directly.

 ++ PRODUCT REVIEWS ++ 
You get one unique, clever and useful product that won't break your bank, but will make you feel great. There are so many great products out there for mindfulness, relaxation, stress relief, energy building, happiness and everything in-between. But who has time to try them all, that’s where we come in. We do the hard work to find great wellness products and services that you’ll love, so you don’t have to.

 ++ EXCLUSIVE OFFERS ++
You get one speical offer for a program or service that is easy, affordable and effective. Because we’re curating the best of the best, sometimes we get partners to foot the bill and give you amazing offers for wellness products and services and we bring those direct to you.

WELLIST IS FREE IT TELL YOU!
Join the largest mobile and online community of wellness seekers. No fees. No gimmicks. Just straight and simple articles, healthy recipes, product reviews and exclusive offers.

++ WELLIST IN A NUTSHELL ++
It’s an app, that you open, and you see 3-5 headlines for articles about everyday wellness topics. You click on the ones you are interested in and read the article, recipe or product review. Save the best to your favorites and share with friends. That’s really it. Seriously, it couldn’t be more simple.

title: Wellbeing Monitor App
description:
A Trusted Solution for a Familiar Senior Care Challenge

Created in accordance with the principles of universal design for use by seniors and their trusted family members, the Wellbeing Monitor brings confidence, reliability and reassurance to independent living. We’ve combined the convenience, practicality and accessibility found in today’s best smartphone and tablet app technologies, with the familiar comfort, personal connection, attention to detail and individual understanding that comes with family care. The result is the Wellbeing Monitor.

Responsive Support for Independent Seniors

Many seniors are happy to carry on with their independent lifestyles and require only a minimal amount of additional care support to sustain the benefits of aging in place. In many cases, they may not have the advantage of a nearby or fully available family member and this gap in their needs can become a source of anxiety for the entire family. Wellbeing Monitor meets this need with a remote wellbeing solution to ensure day-to-day wellbeing is maintained, and should urgent assistance ever be required, seniors are only one-click away from the response they need.

Wellbeing Monitor requires an active subscription for monitoring users. You may choose either a monthly or yearly subscription, and can choose different subscription levels for monitoring 1 user (29.99 monthly or 349.99 yearly), 2 users (59.99 monthly or 699.99 yearly), or 3 users (89.99 monthly or 999.99 yearly). Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and will be billed at a renewal cost of 1 user (29.99 monthly or 349.99 yearly), 2 users (59.99 monthly or 699.99 yearly), or 3 users (89.99 monthly or 999.99 yearly). Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. Please refer to our terms of use and privacy policy for more information at https://www.wellbeingmonitor.com/privacy.html

title: QuitNet
description:
Don’t quit alone. Join the largest online community of other people who have decided to quit smoking forever. QuitNet has been helping smokers quit since 1995, and it’s still going strong! It’s the safe, supportive place where smokers and ex-smokers gather to quit and stay quit. 

Main features:

• Take the daily pledge. Join other members who have also pledged not to smoke today. 
• Set a quit date with the quit-date calendar.
• Receive quit-tip emails to help you stay quit.
• Help finding the right medication with suggestions just for you.
• Talk about how your quit is going, and see other members’ successes and challenges.
• Give your post a “Craving” tag and you’ll get the help you need! 
• Give your post a “Question” tag, and a trained quit coach will answer your question.

title: Sonoma Rises
description: In October, 2017, Sonoma County, California experienced devastating and historic wildfires. Sonoma Rises is designed for anyone who was impacted by this event. The mission is to help Sonoma County residents build resilience and increase their well-being following the wildfires. The app is free, available in English and Spanish, and helps connect users with free and local mental health care services. Users can access customized tools to help cope with stress, heal from loss, prioritize self-care, connect with others, manage anger, and track their mood. There are also tools designed just for teens. Sonoma Rises hopes to serve as a model for other communities recovering from disaster. Together, we will rise.

title: Nao. Voice Social for Relief
description:
Nao. is a voice-based social platform to reduce your stress.

Various experiences and encounters determine your mood: you may feel excited today and down in the dumps tomorrow.
Nao is an anonymous voice-based social platform that will help you to cope with daily challenges, loneliness, depression, anxiety, ADHD, autism, and some stress-related disorders. This platform is for people with differences.
Live Happier with Nao.!


---What is Nao?
Nao is a social journaling platform to overcome negative feelings.
The AI friend who can improve your mental well-being will help you.
It's kind of a voice-based social journal for people with Neat Freak, temper, ADHD, Autism, Dyslexia, Anxiety, Depression, Loneliness, Stress.

Remember: you are not alone. With Nao, you can create a meaningful connection with people who share your experience. Our AI-powered friend will try his best to encourage and support you in every step you make.

Why you need
According to some researches, keep using them makes people more tend to become mental illness and commit suicide. Actually, many of you may feel tired about flooding notifications and messages. There are some aggressive or negative sides in some of SNS in blue.　
This tiredness and negative communication will make a bad cycle not only for our mind but also our society. Change negative social climate to positive with Nao.

---Why?

Our CEO Yoshua has been diagnosed with ADHD, one of the developmental disorders. However, it didn’t prevent him from becoming an entrepreneur and living his life to the fullest. He created Nao to end the stigma and help people who feel they are different in their own way. 

These days, social media are filled with smiling selfies, happy relationships and humblebragging about achievements. According to the numerous researches, it can make people feel miserable and trigger mental health problems, from anxiety to depression, and even suicide. 

We are deeply concerned about the negative impact of social networking apps. That’s why we created Nao. With Nao, we can help you create positive social feedback loops and bring you inner peace.

Features:

*Recording
- You can record your feelings for up to 30 seconds.
- You can talk to Nao by choosing your emotion; Excited, Happy, Calm, Sad, and Angry.

*Sharing
- You can share your post with others!
- You can choose public or private.
- Your post becomes anonymous when you publish it at public.

*Feedback
- AI assistant “Ashlee” based on Motivational Interview will reply to you every time.
-“Ashlee” is a digital assistant which leads you to a positive mind with traditional therapeutic communication.

*Story
- You can see and hear other’s post.
- You can also give positive feedback with your voice messages.

*Reviewing
- You can review your feelings by date.
- You can check up and down changes in your emotion from time to time.

About Terms of Use
We reserve the right to remove Content that violates the User Agreement, including, for example, copyright or trademark violations, impersonation, unlawful conduct, or harassment. Information regarding specific policies and the process for reporting or appealing violations can be found in our Help Contact: info@holoash.com

Mental Health
Self-watching is an exercise to make your life happier. So our product helps you to watch yourself.
In the floods of information, don't look back in anger. All we need is to help each other.

About HoloAsh

The San Francisco and Tokyo based company, founded in 2018. We are creating positive social feedback loops for mental well-being.
We are cognitive scientists and AI Engineers. Yoshua CEO thinks that he wants to create a social system in which differences can thrive.

He has ADHD and he was treated as lazy, slow, and totally hyperactive since he was a child. But he thinks it's Stigma. It is important to create a society for invisible Disability.

title: Wattson Blue
description:
***Now featured in in CYCLING WEEKLY, as one of the top training and recovery apps for Cycling in 2019!***

Balance stress and recovery to maximise your long-term performance. Whether you are an athlete or just want to perform to your best, Wattson Blue helps you improve and avoid burnout.

If you use Strava, get instant HR and Power insights, and optimise your training and recovery with HRV and other well-being metrics.

Link Strava and get insights including training load (TSS) and time in zones for your activities. Record your Heart Rate Variability (HRV), sleep, nutrition and well-being metrics in Wattson Blue for readiness feedback.

You can track your HRV using the camera on your phone, or if you have an Oura ring, you can link this to automatically sync your HRV and sleep with Wattson Blue.

Heart Rate Variability (HRV) is an important indicator of your body’s stress and recovery levels. Tracking your HRV and other metrics, and training according to feedback from Wattson Blue will enable you to challenge yourself, stay motivated and hit your goals.

Wattson Blue uses elite level sports science, developed alongside student athletes at Oxford University, to help athletes (and teams) improve their physical and mental well-being and maximise each athlete's long-term personal performance.

FEATURES TO HELP YOU TRAIN SMARTER:

** Daily subjective, sleep and nutrition metrics
** HRV and resting heart rate using your phone’s camera
** Training, recovery and readiness to train feedback
** Sync your training from Strava
** Sync your sleep and HRV from Oura ring
** Training Load (TSS) using Power, HR (TRIMP), Pace and RPE
** Fitness/Fatigue/Form (CTL/ATL/TSB)
** Time spent in zones 
** Peak heart rate, power, speed, and pace curves (Premium)
** Set RPE for each activity (Borg Rate of Perceived Exertion)
** Current week’s summary 
** Comparison to other athletes
** Female athletes: Period tracking

Apple Health:
You can give permission to Wattson Blue to read your data, such as sleep, HR, HRV, activities and more from Apple Health. This will allow you to skip some of the daily metrics (via Metrics Settings page). We will incorporate this data into our daily feedback. You can revoke these permissions at any time by going to Apple Health Kit settings on your device.

****Go premium : ****

New Wattson Blue athletes receive a 3-week free trial to Wattson Blue Premium. After this period, you can continue using a lot of Wattson Blue features with your standard membership, or you can subscribe on a monthly or yearly basis. As a Premium member, you will receive new features to help you train and rest smart, including:
- FTP and FTHR Fitness estimates 
- Activity achievements for this year and overall - see if you hit a 'top 3' power, pace, hr or cadence
- Activity peaks: see your activity peak values for different durations
- Longer term history
- More detailed training insights.
- and more.

If you subscribe, your iTunes account will be charged at the point of purchase. Your subscription will auto-renew unless you cancel within your iTunes account at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the price shown for the product you have subscribed to in the "Premium Membership" page. You can turn auto-renew off at any time by visiting your iTunes account. If you subscribe before your free trial period ends, you will forfeit any remaining 'free trial' period.

Any issues, email us at support@wattson.blue. We aim to answer any queries within hours if not quicker.

Privacy policy: https://wattson.blue/privacy-policy/
Terms of service: https://wattson.blue/terms-of-service/

title: mWELL
description:
mWELL is designed to supplement individuals' well-being by providing users with a one-stop platform where they can access videos and materials on self-care practices,  as well as capture data to track progress on their efforts to promote their own well-being.  The app also has capabilities for journaling and connecting with others as a learning community. 

Features of the mWELL App that promote health and well-being:
Quick access to video tutorials and educational materials related to self-care and mind-body practices
Data capture for users to self-track and to monitor ongoing progress on their self-care
Ecological momentary features to prompt users about engaging in specific self-care activities and real-time data capture and analytics to visualize behavioral patterns
Use of machine learning to provide users with feedback on milestones reached (and within reach)
Recommendation engine that provides best practices and guidance to users
Access to a community to exchange best practices and discuss progress
Data visualization and analytics that provide deep insights for specific programs that require expanded evaluations.

title: Plant Life Balance
description:
Choose from one of ten ‘living looks’, then drag and drop your favourite plants into your room to see how they will make your space healthier and more relaxing.

The app even rates the health and wellbeing of your space based on how many plants you have in it – drawing on science by RMIT University. 

Download it now for free!


JUST ONE PLANT CAN IMPROVE INDOOR AIR QUALITY 25%

Paint fumes, furniture finishes and air pollution can make your home’s air less than fresh. 

Just one plant can make a big difference. Adding more can clean your air completely – and make you feel more relaxed and inspired.

Plant Life Balance is packed with custom plant styles, scientifically designed to improve your health and wellbeing – and give your home a fabulous new living look at the same time.

Simply choose the look you like, then try it in your space.


HOW PLANT LIFE BALANCE WORKS:
=============================
Rate your space:
1. Choose a home, office or outdoor space
2. Tell the app how many plants are in the space
3. Get your health and wellbeing rating
4. Start adding plants and see your rating go up
5. Get your plant list and look delivered to your inbox

Style your space: 
1. Choose the look you like - there’s one for everyone 
2. Take a photo of any room or outdoor space, or choose an existing photo 
3. Drag and drop virtual plants into the space 
4. Move them around until everything is just right, then save your look or get it delivered to your inbox
5. Now make it happen - head to the accredited nursery finder to see what’s near you


KEY FEATURES: 
=============
• Exclusive Plant Life Balance rating system backed by scientific research from RMIT University on the health and wellbeing benefits of plants.
• 100+ plants of all shapes sizes and varieties to try in your space, all professionally photographed so they look real as you add them.
• Ten junglicious designer style looks to choose from
• Plant guide and care tips from the The Planthunter
• Your personally curated shopping list of plants to help you start the journey to a better Plant Life Balance


Download Plant Life Balance now for free!
releaseNotes: - updated Firebase integration

title: LYS: Light | Sleep | Wellbeing
description:
If you spend your days indoors, at home or at work, then this is the app for you. 

Instead of measuring how you sleep, start measuring the main influencing factor on your sleep.

Did you know that the light that you receive through your eyes is one of the main factors affecting your sleep quality and your energy levels? Use the LYS app to measure the light quality in your surroundings and see how the light affects you in real-time.

Are you feeling sleepy or energised right now? 

Using your phone camera, the LYS app beautifully illustrates how the light in your surroundings is affecting your body and brain. Improve sleep in a matter of days and boost concentration, energy levels and productivity. 

To access more advanced features that will help you reach better light habits, pair the LYS app with the LYS wearable pin. 

With the wearable device paired, use the NOW function for a more accurate reading of the precise light stimulation your body is receiving in real-time from your surroundings. 

With our scientific research-based recommendations, you can set your personal light goals and track your progress with three daily light targets. 

Paired with the LYS wearable you can access the DAY graph, which gives you an overview of your 24-hour cycle, your wake up and bedtime. Compare progress and go back in time to see previous days. The LYS app now has three daily light targets to help you reach your optimum light intake in the morning, afternoon and evening.

Download the app and start doing light right.
releaseNotes:
This new app version is packed full of exciting features:

• Personalised tips and nudges for your age, gender and chronotype (morning/evening person)
• NOW camera-only mode. Point your phone camera and let LYS tell you if the light in your surrounding is making you sleepy or energised
• DAY function shows you personalised wake-up and bedtime marks on the LYS 24 h clock, allowing you to dictate your day and night cycle
• A beautifully designed 24-hour cycle that visualises your light intake in an accessible and delightful way
• Customise your daily goals in the MY GOALS settings with our researched recommendation guidance
• Reach your Morning Light goal to kickstart the day
• Day Light goal keeps you energised for longer throughout the day and helps you avoid the afternoon dip
• Reach 100% of your Night Light goal in preparation for a sound sleep every night.

What else is included?

There is a Glossary function filled with insights on the terms we use, from circadian rhythms to Lux and Kelvin. We also produce insightful content on light, which can be accessed directly through the app’s Reflection function.

title: Making Peace Before You Eat
description:
In a busy world, spending time quietly enjoying our meal is often not a priority. We eat while working or watching television, on the computer or phone, distracted with social media, or lost in our daily concerns and the endless to-do list. The impact is that the state of the body while eating is often contracted and even stressed; and it’s affecting our minds and our ability to digest optimally.

Making Peace Before You Eat is the companion app to Angie Cowen's much-anticipated second book, and has been designed to help you bring in connection, gratitude and the stillness of the present moment, wherever you may be.

The app offers audio meditations and rituals in a beautifully designed, easy-to-use format, and also includes a weekly meditation tracker and mindful map, showing a heat map of where in the world the mindful community is practicing with the app.

------------------------------

About the Team

We're committed to improving and expanding on this app, just as we always strive to improve and expand ourselves. If there's something you love about this app, please share it with a positive review. And if there's something you'd love to see, or something not quite right, please get in touch with us so we can see what's possible together.

Much love, Angie and Jeremy xx
hello@lovelifeandglutenfree.com

------------------------------

Coming Soon

- More meditations
- The option to save mindful minutes to the Apple Health app
- Meditation timer
- Reminders
- And a whole lot more
releaseNotes:
Hi beautiful one

This week our intention has been to make the app even more delightful for you to use. And so:
- the meditation player handle animates more smoothly as you move it to position
- the mindful map shrinks the dots as you zoom in so that you can see more detail
- we also found a bug for iPad users when rotating the map, so we escorted it respectfully outside

Our beautiful contributors are out working on some new guided meditations for you as we speak, and the option to save your mindful minutes from Making Peace to the Apple Health app is almost ready!

Much love

Angie and Jeremy xx

title: Krystallos
description:
Krystallos hacks into your natural motivations to help you achieve the life you want.  

Krystallos is:
- personalized for each user
- easy to set your goals and plan how to achieve them
- based on Shwartz’s Theory of Basic Human Values

We start by helping you define your core values and a hierarchal structure of values that support the core. We then take that information and align it with personal drives or motivations you already have in your life (ie: the drive to achieve things)  From there you create action plans to move your life towards using those already occurring drives to achieve the overall life you want.   

Some benefits to using Krystallos:
 - increase self esteem
 - take the anxiety out of making lasting change in you life
 - achieve happiness
 - strengthen relationships
 - living more authentically
 - reduces stress and conflict

The basic app allows you to define your values and create what we call your Humanistic Tree, the hierarchal structure of core and supporting values.  We provide a high level outline of how to use the information in your life.   

The Monthly and Yearly Premium Subscription plans allow you to:
 - see what motivational categories are currently in your life
 - create action plans to create long lasting change in your life
 - help you make those changes in a way that increases their effectiveness
 -  track your success

title: Get Up! Enjoy your day by Hypnosis!
description:
* Start your day with motivation and in a good mood!
* Get up much easier and better!
* Develop positive thoughts for the day!

GET UP FREE! ENJOY YOUR DAY BY HYPNOSIS!

"Get Up free!" is the little power bar for your ears! Give yourself five minutes rest and relaxation before getting up. Listen to this short hypnosis program immediately after waking up and get into a cheerful state of relaxation!

With "Get Up free!" you get your daily dose of motivation for a good start into the day!

ABOUT KIM FLECKENSTEIN

„Get Up free!“ was designed by well-known German Hypnotherapist Kim Fleckenstein. Kim Fleckenstein is a certified alternative practitioner in psychotherapy, a clinical Hypnotherapist and NLP-Master-Coach. Based in Munich she already published a range of best-selling self-help and hypnosis programs as Apps and MP3s under the label GET ON APPS!. Her unique technique and self experiences have helped to create the special character and heart of her recordings.

Getting requests from all over the world, she decided to publish her hypnosis programs in English language as well. Together with professional and native speaker Cathy Weber she made it reality! 

WHAT YOU GET

* A 5-Minute professional and free Hypnosis session using the latest hypnotic and relaxation techniques – suitable for both, beginners and more experienced users.
* The professional and warm voice of professional speaker Cathy Weber, which leads you into a deep state of relaxation and change.
* A high quality and state of the art recording.
* Professionally composed background music for every program by CSW Music.
* Customize your settings and discover other useful features. (only available with the full versions!)

PLEASE NOTE

Do not listen to this program while operating a motor vehicle or during any other activity that requires your full attention.  This program does not replace a doctor or any other medical aids.  The best effect can be achieved by listening to this program once a day over a period of 4 weeks.

GET UP! IS YOUR PERSONAL COACH! ALWAYS WITH YOU! GIVE IT A TRY, NOW!

title: EmMa The Emotional Manager
description:
EmMa provides practical, easy to use researched-based techniques from the field of psychology, that you can use to manage anxiety, feel better and improve your life. 

TECHNIQUES:
The key to anxiety relief is learning how to manage and relate to your anxious thoughts and feelings in new ways.  EmMa’s techniques have been grouped into 4 sections.

BASICS - These techniques will help you understand, recognize and evaluate your anxious thinking.  

MANAGE WORRIES - These techniques will show you how to break the mental habit of unproductive worrying.

CHANGE ANXIOUS THOUGHTS - Use these techniques to learn how to manage the thoughts that lead to anxious thinking and stop focusing on “What if?” scenarios. 

CALM THE BODY - Soothe the body and calm the mind with daily practice of these mindful techniques.

OTHER FEATURES:

PANIC ATTACK AUDIO GUIDE:
EmMa will help you through a Panic Attack.  Learn the steps to stop panic in its tracks. If you do have a panic attack, EmMa’s audio guide will support you through it.

COPING CARDS:
Add your favorite techniques to your personalized Coping Card. This is a short-cut to the techniques that work best for you.  Or, use one of EmMa’s preset Coping Cards to quickly find a list of techniques to manage anxious feelings and racing thoughts.

MOOD TRACKER:
Check in on your progress using the Anxiety Assessment.  Track your mood over time, and watch your anxiety decrease as you use EmMa’s techniques daily.

SOCIAL SUPPORT:
Sometimes, we just need extra support. EmMa will send a simple text to the person you select, when you choose “Send Alert” at the bottom of your Coping Card.   

PRICING: EmMa has a one-time fee and no in-app purchases.  Everything is available to you with your purchase.  

Questions, comments or technical support?  We will be happy to answer. Email us at emotionalmanager@gmail.com

If you enjoy EmMa, please post a review!  It really helps to get the word out to others who suffer from anxiety and would benefit from using this app.

title: Lifepots
description:
The only app you will need for overall health and wellbeing.

--

Let’s face it, the world is not designed to make us happy.

Polio and Cholera were epidemics of past generations.

The mental and physical health epidemics we are currently going through are much more subtle.

Balance is the answer. Research proves a more balanced life makes us healthier, happier and more fulfilled. 

Lifepots builds on that research to bring you an app that helps you live a more balanced life.

------

Lifepots Pro* is free for 7 days, on all your devices. No strings attached. No automatic subscriptions or charges will be made. After 7 days, Lifepots Pro features will be locked, but our basic features will remain free to use forever.

● GET AN OBJECTIVE VIEW OF YOUR LIFES BALANCE
See how you really spend your time. This can be quite shocking at first, but in our experience usually leads to making positive change in the right direction

● SET TARGETS PUSHING YOUR LIFE IN THE RIGHT DIRECTION*
Once you get a good idea of how you spend your time you can start to push areas of your life further. Spend 2 hours a week on health, then the next week aim for 3! 

● SEE WHAT THE REST OF YOUR LIFE WILL LOOK LIKE*
Lifepots uses what it knows about how you spend your time to predict how your life may look. This helps you stop making the mistake of thinking you have all the time in the world left, and thinking you will have time for certain parts of your life later...

● REPEAT EVENTS / FAVOURITES / AUTOCOMPLETE*
Lifepots makes logging your time easy. 
Use repeat events to quickly add the things you do regularly. 
Add favourites that let you add the things you do frequently quicker. 
We also learn about you over time (But don't share any of your data) and finishing your sentences. 
In our experience with these features you can reflect on your day in seconds!

* Requires Lifepots Pro after 7-day free trial. See below for more details. 

------

Lifepots pro pricing: 

£0.49 monthly, £2.79 yearly, £3.99 One-Time

------

Price may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will not be able to cancel the subscription once activated. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.

---

Privacy Policy: http://lifepots.io/privacypolicy
Terms of Service: https://www.lifepots.io/terms

title: RoundGlass Reach
description:
What is RoundGlass Reach?

Roundglass Reach is a Wellbeing Solution that enables you to become the best version of yourself through:
•	building healthy habits along with your friends, family & colleagues
•	finding and consulting with the top care providers - doctors, nutritionists, fitness trainers and mental health professionals
•	personalized food & activity coaching with customized diet and fitness plans
•	medicine reminders and managing all your health records in one place

Roundglass Reach app empowers you to elevate not only your holistic wellbeing, but even that of your loved ones. So, wherever you are, with REACH, holistic wellbeing is never far.

How do I REACH my goal of overall wellbeing?

The RoundGlass REACH app helps to expand your continuum of care with a wide spectrum of user friendly features. It offers you an effortless experience through seamless integration with the Health App. Here’s how we do it:

Build Healthy Habits with your friends and family
Choose from hundreds of healthy habits across -
•	Food & Nutrition
•	Health & Fitness 
•	Stress management
•	Mindfulness
•	Sleep and energy
•	Happier Relationships

And it doesn’t end here. You can customize your habits according to your needs and help you chase that vision with ease. 

Enjoy the process of becoming healthier

Reach ensures habit formation is fun for you. However, here’s what all you can do within Reach while building healthy habits.

•	Track progress & set milestone reminders
•	Invite your loved ones to become your habit buddies 
•	Share your achievements on social feed across your network
•	Dare a friend with a fun challenge and spread the enthusiasm
•	Enhance camaraderie within your official network. Nudge, Remind or Congratulate your buddies on their habit progress. It works!

Connect to high-quality care easily

•	Discover and connect with top care providers across the country
•	Stay updated with health and wellbeing of your loved ones with “Care Circles”
•	Get easy to understand growth charts & IAP immunization schedule for your kids
•	One-touch access to all your health records – Care Notes, Prescriptions, Lab reports, Hospital records, Bills etc.
•	Manage all your medications with regular reminders & updated records
•	Track your food, physical activity and health stats like BMI, Heart Rate etc
 
Elevate your wellbeing with expert coaching
•	Speak to, chat with and get timely advice from expert nutritionists and certified fitness coaches
•	Get your personalized food and activity plan on your mobile
•	Unlimited access to a goldmine of health articles and nutritious recipes

title: INM Child Wellbeing
description:
Please note: This mobile app is for early years practitioners and can only be used with the Interactive Nursery Manager system.

Used as part of our unique Interactive Nursery Manager system, the INM Child Wellbeing mobile app enables early years practitioners to quickly and accurately record, monitor and track every aspect of a child’s wellbeing and their individual care needs. The Wellbeing App has been designed by nursery directors, managers and practitioners to quickly and effectively capture all aspects of a child’s care and daily routine including sleep and nappy change times, medication and food and drink consumption. No more lost paper copies before filing! A complete record of every aspect of a child’s care record in one place and accessed by date range, allowing easy tracking over periods of time. 

It also provides a faster, more effective way to ensure you are sharing important information with parents. For busy parents who perhaps find it difficult to discuss their child’s full day at nursery during pick-up times, information from the app can be viewed in the INM Parent Portal and this allows them to reflect on their child’s day when they get home. Did their child have an afternoon nap? If so, for how long? How much did they eat and drink during snack or lunch time?

With the INM Child Wellbeing app, children’s daily care plans, allergies and protocols can all be recorded, tracked and updated with ease. The app also facilitates electronic signatures on tablets which enables parents to sign their child in or out of nursery and to also sign any child wellbeing related forms. No more missing signatures on important documents.

Access can be granted to individual staff members based on job role and responsibilities, ensuring you meet all data protection requirements whilst meeting each child’s individual needs.

title: Nourish
description:
1 MONTH FREE TRIAL: MOTHER'S ‘GO-TO’ RESOURCE FOR INSPIRATION IN EMOTIONAL WELLBEING & SELF-CARE.

Motherhood is tough. Magical? Yes! Rewarding? Yes! But also relentless, exhausting, stressful and more....

The Nourish app contains >120 practical self-care tools, specifically designed for mothers, to boost our positive wellbeing & protect our mind, so we can better navigate the storms and maximise those magical highs. 

We're a team of mothers, just like you – in the thick of it, riding the ups and downs of motherhood. We're passionate about sharing our wellbeing expertise and tools, to help others ride motherhood’s roller-coaster more smoothly. Because we're on this crazy journey together! 

The Nourish app will be your personal champion, your support team, your daily dose of nourishment - accessible in your pocket, in every moment.

When we look after our mental health it's our children that reap the rewards. 

WHAT’S INSIDE?
*******************************************
> A broad library of over 120 self-care tools, specifically tailored to mothers, for you to explore & discover, depending on your needs and preferences in that moment
> 33 audio, 29 videos, >60 short reads across a wide range of disciplines including: Mindfulness, Yoga, Breathing, Yoga Nidra, Psychology, Mantras, Nutrition & more

6 WAYS TO ACCESS TOOLS
*******************************************

NOURISH - Tools grouped under Suzy Reading's 8 Vitality categories (R) e.g. Coping skills, Mood boosters

FEELINGS - Tools grouped under common motherhood feelings e.g. Overwhelm, Guilt, Anxiety, Loneliness etc

CHALLENGES - Tools grouped under common motherhood challenges e.g. Sleep deprivation.

NOURISH TEAM - Access all the tools from a specific team member by clicking on their image anywhere in the app.

EXPLORE - Browse tools by format (e.g. Video, Audio, Text); by length (e.g. <5 mins, 5-12 mins, 13+ mins); and by discipline (e.g. Mindfulness, Yoga etc)

FAVOURITES - Build your personal toolkit. ‘Heart’ a content item and see it appear on your Favourites page.

GENTLE, SUPPORTIVE MESSAGES
*******************************************
Accept notifications and receive gentle, supportive messages & reminders to encourage you to look after yourself & foster self-compassion; uplifting quotes; content highlights; and happiness challenges. You can turn this feature OFF in Settings at any time. 

FREE TRIAL & SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS
*******************************************
Nourish offers a 1-month FREE trial with the selection of a subscription option. The free trial gives you FULL access to ALL content within the app. 

Our mission is to support as many mothers as possible. We need to charge a small subscription to be sustainable and enable us to reach more mothers. It also means we can create more content to meet your different needs at different stages of your journey. 

- Subscription options: monthly (£2.99/month); quarterly (£5.99/3 months); annual (£17.99 /12 months). When selecting an option, you won’t be charged during the free trial period.
- All of Nourish’s subscription options provide FULL access to ALL the above content, features and future updates.
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.  You will be charged based on the cost of the subscription option you chose.

- Please see Apple’s auto-renewing subscription details for more information. 
- You can cancel your subscription at any time by going to your iTunes account settings after purchase. 
- Our Terms of Use: https://www.thenourishapp.com/terms-and-conditions

With love & hugs, The Nourish Team xx

title: ActivBeats
description:
ActivBeats™ by WBD101 is a fitness tracker apps that tracks the cardiovascular activities such as Running, Jogging, Cycling (Indoor) and Cycling.

It tracks your activities including distance, time, speed, elevation, calories burned & heart rate) and can share your results to social media. 

The uniqueness of this apps include the Heart Rate Zone tracking and VO2max testing. 

Heart Rate Zone tracking allows you to maintain your exercise intensity to keep within the Fat Burn Zone, Muscle Build Zone or the Anaerobic Zone, so as to either get the maximum exercise benefit or avoid over exertion. 

The VO2max test is a very useful 3 minute Alternate Knee Raise test that will indicate the maximum or optimum rate at which the heart, lungs, and muscles can effectively use oxygen during exercise, this is a very good indication of your fitness level and even longevity and is based on a scientific paper published by Prof Stanley Hui, Chinese University of Hong Kong and Fellow of the American College of Sports Medicine.

ActivBeats now support standard heart-rate profile

description:

The main features of you Heka App

– Monitor your heartbeat (Heart Rate)
– Monitor your breathing (Breath Rate)
– Monitor your UV (Ultra violet Rays)
– Monitor your Oxygenation (Oxygen Value)
– Monitor your PPG waves & Quality for  HR, BR, Mood/Fatigue, Oxygen.

These data will be stored in your Personal Dashboard and you can get daily, weekly and monthly reports on your health with a trend chart.
A scheduler will perform automatic measurements to keep all your values up to date.

title: Recharge - Move Well, Sleep Well, Be Well
description:
Recharge is a personalised six-week program that helps improve your general health and wellbeing by focusing on four key areas: 

1. A regular wake and sleep time each day, achieved gradually over six weeks;
2. An alarm clock that triggers fun activities designed to get you up and out of bed;
3. Increasing your exposure to daylight early in the day, to help reset your body clock; and,
4. Encouraging you to increase physical activity, especially within two hours of waking up. 

Establishing a good sleep/wake routine that includes regular exercise and early daylight exposure will help improve your mood, energy and general health and wellbeing as well as helping you sleep better at night. 

---Features---
• Receive practical tips to improve your sleep/wake routine and wellbeing
• Get daily reports to track your mood, energy, exercise and sleep
• View graphs to help monitor your progress

---Progress tracker--- 
Recharge asks a few simple questions to set your personalised program goals. Simply answer a few questions about your mood, energy, exercise and sleep, to receive a daily report that will show you which goals you’ve met each day. Your progress tracker will help you see the relationship between your mood, energy, exercise and sleep over the six-week program.

• Morning check in: Rate your sleep quality and note the time you went to bed
• Afternoon check in: Rate your mood and energy (plus get a bonus tip)
• Night check in: Log the amount and intensity of exercise you’ve done today

---Wellbeing guide---
Simply click on one of the helpful tips provided in the Recharge app to view the Wellbeing guide. This is a collection of simple, practical and evidence-based tips on sleep and how it affects your body, diet, exercise, energy, mood and more.

---Not recommended for shift workers---
At this stage, Recharge is not suitable for shift workers – especially people working on rotating rosters, as it's difficult to establish a regular sleeping pattern. 

Recharge is the result of a collaboration between ReachOut Australia, The University of Sydney’s Brain & Mind Research Institute, Inspire Ireland Foundation and the Young and Well Cooperative Research Centre.

---Legal disclaimer---
The advice, information and activities within the Recharge app and Wellbeing guide are for educational purposes only. It is not intended or implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice. If you find that the app is not helping improve your sleep, general health and wellbeing, or your situation has worsened, see a doctor. By downloading this app, you agree to the terms and conditions provided at http://recharge.youngandwellcrc.org.au/terms

title: Anxiety - Tips & Quotes
description:
Anxiety is an emotion that everyone experiences from time to time. It’s natural to feel stressed before a performance or an exam, or even during a particularly busy or overstimulating period. However, anxiety itself is more than simply 'stress'. If you notice yourself experiencing anxiety for long periods of time, and you can't seem to kick it, a closer examination of this may be beneficial. 
Anxiety is a highly prevalent negative mental experience that can be experienced in a range from a chronic low dose of worry to sharp pangs of panic. When you're struggling with anxiety, it can seem impossible to overcome. Fortunately, there are mental and physical options for reducing anxiety and treating it at the source.
The following app may help reduce your anxiety levels, both in the heat of the moment and on a long-term basis.
Recommend it to your Friends!!!

title: AMITA Health Check

title: Student Health App
description:
"Reliable, relevant health advice for young adults who want to look after themselves and use medical services wisely" (Dr Dominique Thompson, Director, Students' Health Service, University of Bristol).

Concerned about a health problem? Not sure what to do next? Too embarrassed to seek help? The Student Health App (previously known as 'ESC Student') allows you to say goodbye to frustrating, confusing and sometimes dangerous online searches for health information. What's more, the app works offline (apart from the hyperlinks), so you can use the app on-the-go without the need for an internet connection.

How does the app help? Open the app and easily access over 900 pages packed with reliable health information - anywhere, anytime, and in private:

•	Troubling health problems – check out what to do next and when to see a pharmacist, nurse or doctor
•	Emergencies and general ill health – discover the truth about life-threatening illnesses as well as sleep problems, feeling stressed, and being tired all the time
•	Common ailments – get to the bottom of headaches, find out how to treat your spots, and manage common aches and pains
•	Mental health – find out what to do when you (or one of your friends) feel low or anxious, self-harm or are worried about drinking too much alcohol
•	Useful links – get fast access to hundreds of links to useful further information

Which topics does the app cover? The Student Health App offers plain-talking reassurance, info and advice on over 125 topics relevant to students in areas such as...

> first aid & emergencies
> common ailments
> mental health problems
> physical (body) symptoms
> love and sex
> healthy living
> travel health
> alcohol & drugs
> long-term health problems
> staying safe at uni
> accessing health services…

...and more.  

Is it safe? In partnership with the University of Bristol Students' Health Service, the app has been co-created by medical doctors and students and is certified by the NHS England Information Standard as a source of clear, reliable and relevant health information. 

Can universities have their own version? We can customise the app for universities - visit www.expertselfcare.com for details. We also review and update the app continuously, at no extra charge. 

Are other student-facing apps available? You may want to check out our 'distrACT' app, offering support for young people who self-harm or feel suicidal. Other new student apps are in the pipeline, addressing student wellbeing and the needs of international students. 

How do I find out about new apps? Stay tuned and like us on facebook (www.facebook.com/expertselfcare), follow us on twitter (www.twitter.com/expertselfcare) and sign up for news through our website (http://www.expertselfcare.com/news/).

How can I give feedback? We will always try to improve this app further, and we'd appreciate your feedback. Please take time to rate the Student Health App on the App Store and complete a short anonymous feedback survey from within the app. Thank you!

Download your Student Health App today for quick, easy and discreet access to reliable health information!

title: Oblumi tapp thermometer
description:
Oblumi tapp is a device that, when connected to a mobile phone, converts into a digital infrared thermometer with a range of capabilities. With tapp you can:

•  Measure across forehead
•  Measure in the ear
•  Measure liquid temperature

Oblumi tapp is much more than a thermometer:

•  It takes an accurate temperature: In just a few seconds you can take your body temperature by placing it on your forehead or in your ear. Its infrared sensor is specially designed for medical use.

• It calculates medicine dosage: who can ever remember the correct dosage to take for a fever? Our app automatically calculates this for you in line with the data of each patient and using the most popular medication.

• It registers all your data: It displays the temperature data history and medication taken, so that your fever can be followed up correctly and the information passed to a medical professional.

• It shares patients’ profiles: You can create as many patients as you need and share them with the users that you wish. The information will be automatically updated to all those who share the patient.

• It sends and receives notifications: you can send automatic temperature or medication notifications to all contacts that you share the information with.

• It configures alarms: avoid problems and activate an alarm so that you never forget to take your temperature or medication.

• It checks the temperature of liquids: how many times have you been worried that the baby’s bottle is too hot or the bath water is too cold? With Oblumi tapp you can take the temperature of any liquid with the same accuracy and speed.

...and much more!...

title: Shae: Virtual Health Assistant
description:
Meet Shae, your Personal Health Assistant. Shae helps you stay healthy and feeling your best by harnessing the power of your epigenetics to provide real-time precision nutrition and lifestyle advice, on demand.
 
Because Shae is scientifically based, you will discover your unique Biotype and Personal Health Code that will help you improve your energy, sleep, stress, weight, pain, digestion, and memory.

Use Shae to know:
Exactly which foods to eat for your particular body
Which foods, drinks and sweets may cause you irritation, mood swings, discomfort and pain
How often and how much to have your foods and drinks
Why each food is good for you to eat or avoid
Food combining personalized to you
Shopping tips for purchasing the best quality foods
Your ideal time of day to eat which foods
Ways to cook that are best for your body
Recipes that incorporate the best foods for you
 
What people say about Shae
 
“Over the past 12 weeks with Shae my health has had incredible results; plus my body has dropped 4 kgs and 15 cm... I have LOVED discovering what foods work best for me..”
 
“I've been eating consciously for years. A year ago I started packing on a lot of weight not knowing why. I started using Shae 10 days ago, lost 10lbs and am soaring with energy! I am so grateful..”
“I am also noticing that using Shae my Psoriasis outbreaks are cooling off, which is great news!!!”
“I used my shopping list. I did not stop eating out. In a week I feel better..”
 
“WOW! Just got on the scale and had an unexpected surprise...I am weighing in at 5 pounds less then when I began, less than a week ago...WOOHOOO!!”
 
“It sures up our identities and give us a lot more integrity about who we are and how we fit into the world and it helps us understand what’s good for us..”
 
 “I am grateful for my 5 pound weight loss along with losing my itchy rash in less than a week! This is amazing!!”
 
What sets Shae apart from the rest
 
Most diets, programs and apps give you generic information based on population science. What we know now is that one size does not fit all in health. You may have tried many things to look, feel or sleep better and they haven’t worked - that’s because we’re all individuals, all unique. No two people in the world are the same, no two people in the world should have the same diet. No two people will have the same advice from Shae. Shae calculates your unique Personal Health Code, based on YOUR body and tailors your health precisely to you.
 
People who have followed Shae’s insights have started to feel shifts and results in as little as a few days to a few weeks - feeling better, more energy, relief from aches and pains, clearer mental function, happier, more focused and engaged in life, better relationships and enjoying their family more. All of this comes from you feeling your best, feeling fabulous, healthy, happy, vital and alive. When you feel like this everything else works better.
 
Shae is powered by a complex system of evidence based science, algorithms and ratios that calculates your personal health code: the secret to you living a happy and healthy life. Shae then incorporates your code seamlessly into your daily life removing the need for hard work or effort to stay feeling fabulous. Your personal health assistant, taking care of all the hard work for you.
 
Because Shae is scientifically based, objective and completely personalized to you, you will need a soft measuring tape to complete the assessment, or you can use the printable version when you register. Do not use online body composition measuring apps as they are not yet advanced enough to give the accuracy that is required for your assessment. Your assessment will take approximately 20-30 minutes and if you fake your answers or skip questions, your results will be inaccurate so please take the time for you.
 
If you already have a Shae account, your FREE Shae app will connect with your account and be accessible immediately for all your health needs.

title: Kitman Labs Athlete
description:
The Athlete app enables you to input information directly into the Kitman Labs Athlete Optimization system.  Your coaching staff can request information about the workload you are performing and gather information about your general well-being or other relevant topics such as your recovery from injury or your reflections on a performance.

There are four main tasks you can perform using the app:

• Respond to RPE requests sent by the coaching staff
• Completing forms assigned to you that day and well-being forms
• Providing information on any individual training sessions you have completed
• Setting reminders to complete well-being forms and other tasks

Please note that Athlete is currently only available by members of sporting organisations that use the Kitman Labs Athlete Optimization System.

title: inKin Wellness & Challenges
description:
We help our individual users as well as companies and organizations through corporate wellness initiatives to be healthier and more active on a daily basis. And, eventually, to preventively take care of their most important asset - their health.


1. Companies, Organizations and Groups

Creating an efficient and engaging corporate wellness program can require time and effort. That's why we have built our platform to make designing and launching corporate wellbeing initiatives easier and more fun.

inKin Corporate Wellness is simple to use and efficient solution that helps run friendly fitness competitions among colleagues, help your staff track their wellbeing and promote a healthy lifestyle in your company. It can also be used as a virtual team building and employee engagement tool.

NEWS FEED - exchange ideas or recipes and share any health-related information with your peers.

LEADERBOARD contains fun and colorful widgets with your team's activity during a certain period.

STATS - your team's overall progress over a desired period or even two periods.

CHALLENGES & COMPETITIONS: create and join a variety of public and private contests.
Challenge – a participant is required to reach either a daily or total goal during a certain period. A participant completes the challenge once he or she meets the requirements. This mode is available for one of these metrics: steps, distance, calories burned, activity time, and sleep.
Competition – the participant who reaches the highest metric (steps, calories burned, distance, activity time) wins the contest.
Team Battle – a competition between an unlimited number of teams. The mode is available for steps, distance, calories burned, activity time.
Group Challenge - allows all participants to reach one goal together. This mode is available for one of these metrics: steps, distance, calories burned, activity time
Multimetric Challenge (coming soon) - allows tracking up to 15 metrics and tasks simultaneously.

DATA EXPORT - export your team's overall progress and contests' results data in CSV files.




2. Individuals

SUPPORTED DEVICES & APPS: Apple (HealthKit app), Fitbit, Garmin, Polar, Samsung, Withings, iHealth, Google Fit, Xiaomi, Jawbone, TomTom, Misfit

YOUR HEALTH AND FITNESS STATS: collect your health and fitness data from different fitness devices and apps or log it manually. You can connect as many devices as you like, and choose which activity trackers show which metrics on your metric page. View your customized charts, graphs and widgets to help you monitor your progress towards healthier you. 

GOALS: we support 20 fitness and health parameters. Set goals to help you stay focused on your progress. 

DUELS - 24-hour head-to-head step challenges with other community members. 

GET SOCIAL
Support your friends on their fitness journey with likes and comments. 
Find new fitness buddies in your local community and across the world.

PRIVACY & SHARING: it is entirely up to you who you want to share your fitness and health data with – our customized settings allow you to share different metrics with certain friends and family.

title: AcuApp® Acupressure
description:
AcuApp© Acupressure 

AcuApp© Acupressure is the best opportunity to test the AcuApp© before you decide to use the premium version (555 illness indications). It gives you an insight into the functionality of the AcuApp© Premium and includes 8 symptoms, which you can treat by acupressure.

Health on demand without medicaments!
AcuApp® has been created by Maitri Hillebrecht® and her empirical knowledge of 25 years. It has been developed for people who want to heal themselves or their family and friends and it also is an essential support for physiotherapists, healers and sports people. Acupressure is considered to be the big sister of acupuncture, because everybody is able to apply it. 

Instructions:
Please download the AcuApp© Acupressure app on your iPhone.
Tap into your disease in the search box above. After that your numbered acupressure point appears. Tap on the point, which is equipped with a photo and an illustration, as well. Below you see the original Chinese name and the appropriate meridian at which your point is situated.
In the box underneath, you’ll find the location of your point. On some points the measure unit called CUN appears, which can be accessed separately.
The box below shows the treatment techniques, which are highlighted in red and you can click on it to get more treatment information. There you’ll find the detailed description to treat your points.

Particularities of the respective points are indicated. Please touch the pictures to view the exact position of your point on the photo and the illustration.
In case many points are given please choose the ones, which are the most convenient for you, at that moment.
 
AcuApp® can be applied comfortably in the office, at home, on the train, on the airplane or in the morning after showering. You'll need nothing else but this app and your hands. 

Also children react fast to this uncomplicated method of treatment.

A useful app which can be applied any time, no matter where you are.
Previous knowledge is not required.

Here we go:
“AcuApp® and its path of well-being!”

The journal is published 6 times per year under the leadership of Joseph Pizzorno, ND, editor in chief, a cofounder and former president of Bastyr University.
